thread.title: U.S. moving toward first Guantanamo repatriation under Trump

title: U.S. moving toward first Guantanamo repatriation under Trump
text:
U.S. moving toward first Guantanamo repatriation under Trump 10:14pm GMT - 01:20 
The U.S. military told Reuters they are advancing toward the first transfer of a prisoner from the Guantanamo Bay detention center under President Donald Trump, a move that would repatriate the detainee to Saudi Arabia. Jillian Kitchener reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. military told Reuters they are advancing toward the first transfer of a prisoner from the Guantanamo Bay detention center under President Donald Trump, a move that would repatriate the detainee to Saudi Arabia. Jillian Kitchener reports.
